title: NKbdProps
description: Neuron keyboard shortcut display component for rendering keyboard key combinations. Accepts a single key or an array of keys for multi-key shortcuts.

oneOf.description: A single keyboard key to display.
An array of keyboard keys representing a key combination (e.g. ['Ctrl', 'S']).

keys.description: Keyboard key(s) to display. Can be a single key string or an array of key strings for combinations.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
